full_threads.body: Thank You

Hi Darren,


Sure, confirming we have updated the image. Please see the attached.

full_threads.body: Hi, Could I have it positioned more like this please?

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body: @ricaV2 +20mins Thanks!

Hi Darren,


We have updated the logo, Let us know if this works for you?

https://shellshockedmedia.com/about-us/

HI,

One more thing.

I just want the blue photo of me swapped out with this photo on the About Us Page please.
Logged 30mins to Harvest
@ricaV2 +30mins Thanks!

Hi Darren, 

Thanks for the update. Confirming the https://shellshockedmedia.com/about-us/ page has been updated.

All good, what ever you have done it has fixed the problem. No more white boarders.

As for profile photo I just want the black and white photo of me swapped out with the photo I sent you on the About Us Page. Leave it in colour please

Hi Darren,

Understood, you wish to remove the borers.

To clarify further, we aren't able to get the borders to show on our computers. Can you please let me know the following information:
  • What monitor you are using?
  • What resolution the screen is?
  • Which browser you are using? (if you can have tested on multiple browsers, please let us know. 
In regards to your profile photo, can you please let us know what you had in mind for the background?

HI Chris,

To be clear, we want to remove the white border on News & Opinion, TYCTAOTV & Shellshocked Travel pages not add them. Is this what you meant?

Hi Darren, 

Thanks for your patience on this.

At present, we are unable to recreate the white border you are experiencing on News & Opinion, TYCTAOTV and Shellshocked Travel pages. The dev team at testing various settings to in a bid get this resolved. 

We will get back to you ASAP.

HI Chris,

On ShellShocked Media's About us page, in my Bio (Darren Robinson) can I please swap out the Black & White photo with this photo please.

Thank You.

Hi Chris,

Sorry about late reply, work is a good thing.

Ok, I hear what you are saying.

With '1Hr Media & Presentation Training' & 2 Hr The Confidence Course, even if we lift the small print up on each, can we please make the orange photo and red strip on these 2 the same length as the other 4?



Also I am not sure why this is a problem to fix? Our Home Page, Video Production Page & Resilience Page The holding jpgs are not cropped as you can see bellow which is what I want.

But News & Opinion, TYCTAOTV & ShellShocked Travel holding jpgs are cropped as you can see? Need to loose the crop please.





Thank You.
Logged 15mins to Harvest
@ricaV2 +15mins Thanks!

Hi Darren,

We have made some updates to the site. Let me know if this works for you?

Hi again,

Just got home and every thing is still the same.

This is ShellShocked Medias Home Page.
